newsArray.description: IPL 2025: The BCCI revealed a revised schedule that includes two double-headers on Sundays, with playoffs starting May 29. However, this coincides with a white-ball series between England and West Indies, affecting more than just one team. As of now, the BCCI is engaging with foreign boards to ensure player participation.
